surface_layer.definition: A mass spectrometry technique that uses a laser to ionize molecules.

deep_layer.mechanism: MALDI involves ionizing a sample using a laser and then measuring the mass-to-charge ratio of the resulting ions.
deep_layer.origin: Development of mass spectrometry techniques for biomolecule analysis.

examples: Analyzing proteins from a gel band

epistemic_metadata.source: Methods to investigate protein–protein interactions - Wikipedia
